abstract: Mark V. Hurd, who resigned from H.P. a month ago, joined Oracle as president and a director.
snippet: Mark V. Hurd, who resigned from H.P. a month ago, joined Oracle as president and a director.
lead_paragraph: In naming Mark V. Hurd, the former chief executive of Hewlett-Packard, as Oracle‘s new co-president, Lawrence J. Ellison, Oracle’s chief executive and largest shareholder, has put his money where his controversial mouth is, Ashlee Vance writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Hurd Is Now a President at Oracle, H.P.’s Rival

abstract: Oracle’s co-presidency will now be shared by two executives known for their history of deal-making: Mark V. Hurd and Safra Catz.
snippet: Oracle’s co-presidency will now be shared by two executives known for their history of deal-making: Mark V. Hurd and Safra Catz.
lead_paragraph: The hiring of Mark V. Hurd (pictured) as Oracle‘s newest co-president arises in part from the former Hewlett-Packard chief’s close friendship with the tech titan Lawrence J. Ellison.

headline.main: The 2 Deal Makers Who Share Oracle’s Presidency

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: In its lawsuit, filed in a California state court, H.P. argued that it was seeking to enforce confidentiality clauses Mr. Hurd had signed.
snippet: In its lawsuit, filed in a California state court, H.P. argued that it was seeking to enforce confidentiality clauses Mr. Hurd had signed.
lead_paragraph: Hewlett-Packard on Tuesday sued Mark V. Hurd, its former chairman and chief executive, one day after he joined rival Oracle as co-president.

headline.main: H.P. Sues Hurd Over His New Job at Oracle

abstract: The lawsuit comes a day after the former Hewlett-Packard chief executive was hired by Oracle, the database software maker.
snippet: The lawsuit comes a day after the former Hewlett-Packard chief executive was hired by Oracle, the database software maker.
lead_paragraph: Hewlett-Packard’s tumultuous breakup with its former chief executive Mark V. Hurd may soon warrant its own reality TV show.

headline.main: H.P. Sues Its Ex-Chief in New Job
headline.print_headline: H.P. Sues Its Ex-Chief In New Job
